column1:
Odeinoichus,"2018-07-15T04:54:51.947Z","More Racing Options for LEGO City","

Set #30358 Dragster: Here’s another free giveaway Polybag from earlier this year, found at retail I purchased it for 5$ and it was nice to finally find some new Polybags in Canada. This particular City set is based on the Speed/Race variety as is another staple when it comes to LEGO Polybags.
Pros:

column2: Model is quite sleek and nicely designed. Large engine featured on back with spoiler for drag/wind resistance.
Driver is nicely detailed and includes race outfit which I believe shares similarities to the race outfits found in Speed Champions sets, only without the endorsement markings.
Simple fun build for hours of fun races, get two and make your own fleet of races.

column1: Cons:

column2: Driver’s compartment has no sides to protect driver from falling out.
Price may hinder some if the free giveaway time was missed.

column1: Overall opinion

A great and fun little Polybag, I’m highly impressed with LEGO City this year, there are a lot less samey vehicles and more variety of characters and models compared to some past years I could name. Highly recommended for Polybag enthusiasts.
